title: How do I turn of the "stunned" etc above my name
body: Is there a option to turn it off or it is permanently there? Thanks

replies.body: No, it's a permanent feature that makes it easier to see what crowd control you are under the effect of. I don't see how it would be that annoying? It's more helpful in my eyes, and it's not covering up anything or getting in the way, it's a small line of text above your health bar...

Pfft easy. It hides health bars under it.

But lets be honest, if you're a smart jungle, you will position to have dragon's hp bar under your own, so unless they click on drag (more likely to get you because of the position though) they wont know its hp and smite will be dodgy, especially if its a rushed steal instead of planned.
I wish Riot made it a toggle option where we have a choice to have it on or off at least lol

im sorry, no you should not be able to, it literally only helps, its illogical to not want it.

..UNLESS you play with no name plates then.. yeh i guess?
Even then I don't really see how CC being clearer and more visible hurts at all.
agreed, i just mean i could atleast comprehend the thinking in it from someone who has no names on =) still dont agree with it though!
To each their own and all that :)
